abstract: While BP appears to be the deep-pocketed party footing many of the bills related to the oil spill, the legal endgame of sorting out the final tab among the companies that owned the well and worked on the Deepwater Horizon rig has also begun
snippet: While BP appears to be the deep-pocketed party footing many of the bills related to the oil spill, the legal endgame of sorting out the final tab among the companies that owned the well and worked on the Deepwater Horizon rig has also begun
lead_paragraph: Who will pay for the oil spill?

headline.main: Liability Questions Loom for BP and Ex-Partners
